SOLR_SERVER.name: solr
SOLR_SERVER.label: Solr Web UI
SOLR_SERVER.description: This host-level alert is triggered if the Solr Cloud Instance is unreachable.

SOLR_SERVER.name: solr_cpu_usage
SOLR_SERVER.label: Solr CPU Utilization
SOLR_SERVER.description: This host-level alert is triggered if CPU utilization of the Solr exceeds certain warning and critical thresholds. It checks the Solr JMX Servlet for the SystemCPULoad property. The threshold values are in percent.
